```{r}

# Load the packages we'll need
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
impeach <- readRDS("impeach.rds")

dem_no_impeach <- impeach %>% 
  filter(for_impeachment == "NO") %>% 
  summarise(n())

dem_yes_impeach <- impeach %>% 
  filter(for_impeachment == "YES") %>% 
  summarise(n())
```

```{r}
dem_yes_impeach
dem_no_impeach


```

According to recent data from the impeach dataset, `r dem_no_impeach` Democrats are currently opposed to impeachment, while `r dem_yes_impeach` Democrats are in favor of impeachment.
